h2_title: The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
content: The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill is hiding on Turtle Island. From the Turtle Island Keeper's Shrine, turn left and run off the edge of the first cliff. The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill is sitting in a golden chest by the rock wall.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Jade_Lotus_Pill_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Jade Lotus Pill Locations', specifically from the subsection 'The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill'.
The content is as follows:
The New West Celestial Jade Lotus Pill is hiding on Turtle Island. From the Turtle Island Keeper's Shrine, turn left and run off the edge of the first cliff. The Celestial Jade Lotus Pill is sitting in a golden chest by the rock wall.
